summary: A violent thug plays opposing yakuza bosses against each other.
cast: Jô Shishido|Misako Watanabe|Tamio Kawaji|Minako Katsuki|Daisaburô Hirata|Eiji Gô|Kôichi Uenoyama|Akiji Kobayashi|Yûzô Kiura|Naomi Hoshi|Hiroshi Kôno|Eimei Esumi|Shuntarô Tamamura|Mizuho Suzuki|Zenji Yamada|Yuriko Abe|Ikuko Kimuro|Shirô Yanase|Tomio Aoki|Ichiro Kijima|Shôzô Miki|Norikatsu Hanamura|Akira Hisamatsu|Takashi Nomura|Gen Mihama|Gô Kuroda|Densuke Mitsuzawa|Ikuo Nikaidô|Hiroshi Midorikawa|Masako Urushizawa|Yoshihiro Yamaguchi|Kensuke Akashi|Yasuo Itoga|Hiroshi Takao|Toshihiko Oda|Masatoshi Takase|Kinzô Shin|Masao Shimizu|Nobuo Kaneko
title: Yajû no seishun
